front.title: Definitions of Managed Parameters for RSVP and SBM network nodes

abstract.t: This memo includes a list of manageable parameters for RSVP and SBMimplementations. These are in addition to those already described inRFC 2206 and RFC 2213. Specifically, it describes parameters for controlof the base signaling protocols themselves, as well as a basic set ofparameters for control of policy decisions by a Local Policy Module.These are not intended to be exhaustive lists but they have beenidentified as useful for practical implementations.
